add(item: str)[source]

Adds an item to the bloom filter.

Parameters:

item – the string to add

query(item: str) → bool[source]

Checks if an item might be in the bloom filter (may have false positives).

Parameters:

item – the string to query

Returns:

True if item might be in the bloom filter, False if it definitely isn’t

Return type:

bool
